body_html: I agree that it would be good to add masking to the attention model and API. But I think adding an op and a separate cuda kernel just for that is a huge overkill. Why not just multiply pointwise by the mask in python before the softmax? Without a good reason, I find a PR like this not acceptable, the code complexity and maintenance cost looks much larger than the simple problem it solves.
